name: Ys Online: The Call of Solum
name_original: Ys Online: The Call of Solum
description:
Ys Online: The Call of Solum is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by CJ Internet. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Key to Play. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Ys Online: The Call of Solum on PC.
